Address.Address1: 17/1-3, SOI PRABARAMEE 4 PRABARAMEE ROAD, PATONG KRATOO

Description.Text: Hyatt Place Phuket, Patong features 161 guestrooms, including ten suites. Many of the rooms have adjoining options for family and friends. Each morning guests can enjoy the hotelâ€™s free hot breakfast, which features hot breakfast items, fresh fruit, local dishes and more. Stay refreshed with a selection of specialty beverages and a variety of premium beers, wines and cocktails. Our 24/7 Gallery Menu offers a freshly made meal, day or night. Guests can dine in our open-air Lobby, at our outdoor pool and patio area or in our air-conditioned, glass-enclosed dining space. Take a relaxing dip in our outdoor pool, cool feet in our wading pool or take advantage of our free 24/7 Stay Fit Fitness Center, which offers stunning views of the ocean. In addition, a kiddie pool and rental games will keep families engaged. For business needs, our E-Room offers free computer use, printing and Internet access. For larger gatherings, consider a meeting room rental with optional catering.

Located at the north end of Patong Beach, at the intersection of Phrabarami and Thawewong roads, Hyatt Place Phuket, Patong sits on a hill overlooking the beautiful Andaman Sea. The majority of guestrooms face westward, offering breathtaking sunsets from spacious balconies. For adventurers and historians, the Big Buddha and Patong Temple are a short drive away. Golfing, fishing, diving and snorkeling tours are available just steps from the hotel. Hyatt Place Phuket, Patong is an ideal resort destination for seekers of all types of recreation and leisure activity.

Hotel provide a freshly made meal, an ice-cold beverage, a selection of espresso roast and a variety of local beers, wines & cocktails. Experience the convenience of our Gallery Kitchen that is free with your stay, the 24/7 Gallery Menu & Market and the Coffee to Cocktails Bar
This accommodation has a medium lobby.
